title: I submitted 3 tickets regarding a false ban
body: I submitted 3 tickets which 1 was deleted and 2 that just got ignored and I waited 72 hours for the first one  48 hours on the second one and 24 hours on the third one. As a huge company i feel like I'm getting back stabbed and refusing to answer. I understand that they get millions of tickets everyday but just choosing to delete my ticket and ignoring my next ones just doesn't seem like support aren't do their jobs. Honestly I know that people can get toxic once in awhile but I spent hours on the account and money. That's all I'm going to say have a nice day.

replies.body: Creating duplicate tickets or spamming replies tend to cause confusion and delays in responding back.  We don't ignore players, but those factors as well as a higher volume can take a bit to reply back.  If you have a ticket number I'd be happy to check on the status for you.
The first ticket number is 32228185 and i clicked on it and it said it does not exist
I was able to verify that your ticket was received and fielded to our PB team.  Tickets are private, so you'll need to be logged into the account that created the ticket at the ticketing center site.
